metadata.synopsis: One liner civilians will say after players cast Wake of the Dead, a spell that summons uncontrollable zombies around the player. These zombies will be hostile to everything. The casting of this spell will make civilians/guards hostile to the player.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe LOW_SorcerousSundries_ZombieSpell to get the spell, then cast it near civilians.(note: the crime implementation of this spell is still not done, so this AD is not going to trigger for now)
